data.name: Deadswitch 3: OpFor Supply Cache
data.detailed_description:
SHARDS

  • 15 Shards

BOOSTS

  • 2x XP for 24 hours

WEAPONS

  • M47 (Shotgun)
  • AK74u (SMG)

CHARACTER ITEMS

  • Machete (Melee Weapon)
  • Recon (Body)
  • Paratrooper (Body)
  • Rocketier (Body)
  • Basic Helmet (Headgear)
  • Basic Helmet Headset (Headgear)
  • Basic Tactical Helmet (Headgear)
  • Medic Helmet (Headgear)
  • Beret (Headgear)
  • Shades (Eyewear)

BONUS

  • OpFor Supply Cache Player Icon

data.short_description: OpFor Supply Cache with 15 Shards and 13 items.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
